topic.title: ZeroNet not working with TOR (0 trackers)
topic.body: I can't use ZeroNet with TOR always on, I get 0 trackers and can't do anything. It worked last month but that's no longer the case. WTF?

topic.title: How to setup a zite so that I can manually sign user certs?
topic.body: Any clue? I tried looking at the source code of a few ID sites and I can't figure it out.

topic.title: ZeroMail not working?
topic.body: I've entered the user, the subject, and the message and when I try to click on Encrypt & Send message it doesn't work. The button is greyed out...

topic.title: Will ZeroNet stop working if I don't update to latest version??
topic.body: I was thinking, if ZeroNet gets compromised what is stopping the terrorist from modifying it in such a way that will disable certain sites? Will a non updated version work? ZeroNet is essentially useless if an out of date version will not work as the programmer or the terrorist could shut it down by making an updated version that becomes unusable...?

1566034184_11TbhWmLbceRuHERFahR7cdrTSBN4.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_328_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): Openbazaar.

Openbazaar is dogshit, literally no one uses it. Can't sell there because there is no buyer traffic. The only time I saw that thing active was when there were drugs on there but they got removed and the app died.

1566177396_18oN5jkSiB1SLb4Jywb4ZnKiwXqtQ.body: I found the problem. When I was accessing a website it showed me a button and I clicked on it, I found out today that Tor bridges completely breaks your connection to trackers.

> [qqqqqqqqqqqqqqqq](#comment_3_18oN5jkSiB1SLb4Jywb4ZnKiwXqtQN5Fau): I found the problem. When I was accessing a website it showed me a button and I clicked on it, I found out today that Tor bridges completely breaks your connection to trackers.

and so you need to disable Tor bridges in the Config if that ever happens to you.

1566044615_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body: I got to admit the API documentation is trash.

1566184630_13ifSHXbs2RtyHF4qkn4GrJ3krWEA.body: Your search skills are very poor.

1566239205_18oN5jkSiB1SLb4Jywb4ZnKiwXqtQ.body:
> [nickwa](#comment_400_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): Did you wait till ZeroNet downloaded all the ZeroMail files, and then refreshed the page? That happens to me because it did not even load all the files when first downloading the site. Check ZeroHello, and wait till it has all the files downloaded. It happened to me multiple times now when deleting and then downloading the site again.

Yes I just figured it out myself as well. I just had to wait a little while until it downloaded. Thanks for the help. :)

1566241449_18oN5jkSiB1SLb4Jywb4ZnKiwXqtQ.body: And if that is the case then the ZeroNet owner is a liar as he has the kill switch to this network...

1566237988_18oN5jkSiB1SLb4Jywb4ZnKiwXqtQ.body: Anyone figured this one out yet?
